item.name: Aegis of the Abyss
entries: {@b Spellguard.} While holding this Shield, you have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks have disadvantage against you.

{@b Arcane Hunger.} As a reaction you can make the shield absorb a ranged spell attack, if the target of the spell is within 10 feet of you. You can use this feature twice per long rest. If a single spell deals more than 90 damage the shield, it shatters.

item.name: Amulet of the Frog
entries: {@b Leapfrog.} This amulet can be used to cast the spell {@spell jump} twice per long rest.
{@b Amphibian.} When attuned to this amulet, you gain a movement speed equal to your walking speed (if you don't have one already).

{@b Knowledge of the Swamp.} If a {@class druid} attunes to this necklace, they gain the following beast shapes: {@creature rat}, {@creature raven}, {@creature giant rat}, {@creature poisonous snake}, {@creature stirge}, {@creature constrictor snake}, Giant Frog, Giant Lizard, {@creature giant poisonous snake}, {@creature crocodile}, {@creature giant spider}, {@creature giant toad}, {@creature giant constrictor snake}, and {@creature giant crocodile}.

item.name: Band of the Firm Grip
entries: {@b Helping Hand.} This ring allows the wearer to cast {@spell mage hand} at will.

{@b Firm Grip.} This ring has 10 charges. As an action, the wearer may expend charges to cast the following spells: {@spell hold person} at 2nd level (3 charges), {@spell hold monster} at 5th level (5 charges), and {@spell Bigby's hand} at 5th level (10 charges). The ring regains {@dice 1d10} spent charges at dawn.

{@ Hold Tight (Curse).} The cursed variant of this item clasps painfully around the wearer's finger and is unable to be removed or unattuned. The curse may be broken by {@spell remove curse} or by severing the finger.
